anya-e0803n2:4_0: Tatthati anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe,
anya-e0803n2:5_0: Tu antu, hi tha, mi ma, taṁ antaṁ, su vho,
anya-e0803n2:6_0: Eyya eyyuṁ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṁ, etho eyyāvho,
anya-e0803n2:7_0: A u, e ttha, aṁ mha, ttha re, ttho vho,
anya-e0803n2:8_0: Ā ū, o ttha, aṁ mhā, ttha tthuṁ, se vhaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:9_0: Ī uṁ, o ttha, iṁ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:10_0: Ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe,
anya-e0803n2:11_0: Ssā ssaṁsu, sse ssatha, ssaṁ ssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe,
anya-e0803n2:12_0: Sabbāsametāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni, tāni tāni parassapadāni nāma.
anya-e0803n2:12_1: Yāni yāni pana parāni cha padāni, tāni tāni attanopadāni nāma.
anya-e0803n2:12_2: Tattha parassapadāni vattamānā cha, pañcamiyo cha, sattamiyo cha, parokkhā cha, hiyyattaniyo cha, ajjataniyo cha, bhavissantiyo cha,
anya-e0803n2:12_3: kālātipattiyo chāti aṭṭhacattālīsavidhāni honti, tathā itarāni,
anya-e0803n2:13_0: Parassapadānamattanopadānañca dve dve padāni paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisā nāma.
anya-e0803n2:13_2: aṭṭhannaṁ vibhattīnaṁ vasena dvattiṁsa, piṇḍitāni parimāṇāneva.
anya-e0803n2:14_0: Dvīsu dvīsu padesu paṭhamaṁ paṭhamaṁ ekavacanaṁ, dutiyaṁ dutiyaṁ bahuvacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:15_0: Tatra vattamānavibhattīnanti anti, si tha, mi ma iccetāni parassapadāni. Te ante, se vhe, e mhe iccetāni attanopadāni.
anya-e0803n2:15_1: Parassapadattanopadesupiti anti iti paṭhamapurisā, sitha iti majjhimapurisā, mi ma iti uttamapurisā, te ante iti paṭhamapurisā, se vhe iti majjhimapurisā, e mhe iti uttamapurisā.
anya-e0803n2:16_1: anti-iti bahuvacananti evaṁ ekavacanabahuvacanāni kamato ñeyyāni.
anya-e0803n2:17_2: syādīhi nāmikavibhattīhi saha sabbasaṅgāhakavasena pana sakatthaparatthādibhede atthe vibhajatīti vibhatti,
anya-e0803n2:17_3: kammādayo vā kārake ekavacanabahuvacanavasena vibhajatīti vibhatti,
anya-e0803n2:17_6: atha vā satipi jinasāsane avibhattikaniddese sabbena sabbaṁ vibhattīhi vinā atthassā’niddisitabbato visesena vividhena vā ākārena bhajanti sevanti naṁ paṇḍitātipi vibhatti.
anya-e0803n2:22_0: Tatra thera-iti avibhattiko niddeso, therānaṁ ayanti thero. Ko so? Vādo.
anya-e0803n2:22_1: Theravādo aññesaṁ vādānaṁ uttamoti ayamattho veditabbo.
anya-e0803n2:26_0: ‘‘Bho khāda piva’’iccatra, vade yo koci codako.
anya-e0803n2:28_0: ‘‘Bhikkhu, bho purisi’’ccādi, padampi, na hidaṁ tathā.
anya-e0803n2:29_0: ‘‘Bhikkhu, bho purisi’’ccādi, si ga lopena vuccati;
anya-e0803n2:31_0: Evaṁ avibhattikaniddeso ākhyātesu na labbhati, nāmesuyeva labbhati.
anya-e0803n2:31_1: Tatrāpi ‘‘aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā te’’ti ettha chandavasena puggala iti rassakaraṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:31_2: na ‘‘kakusandha koṇāgamano ca kassapo’’ti ettha kakusandha iti avibhattikaniddeso viya avibhattikaniddeso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n2:31_3: ‘‘Bhikkhu nisinne mātugāmo upanisinno vā hoti upanipanno vā’’ti ettha pana bhikkhūti idaṁ bhikkhumhīti vattabbatthattā bhumme paccattantipi adiṭṭhavibhattikaniddesotipi vattuṁ yujjati.
anya-e0803n2:31_4: Tattha pana chandavasena katarassattā tāni padāni avibhattikaniddesapakkhampi bhajantīti vattuṁ na yujjati.
anya-e0803n2:32_0: Tattha parassapadānīti parassa atthabhūtāni padāni parassapadāni.
anya-e0803n2:32_1: Etthuttamapurisesu attano atthesupi attanopadavohāro na kariyati.
anya-e0803n2:36_1: Ettha pana paṭhamamajjhimapurisesu parassatthesupi parassapadavohāro na kariyati.
anya-e0803n2:44_0: Tasmā idha paṭhamapurisādīnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ purisānaṁ vacanatthaṁ na pariyesāma.
anya-e0803n2:44_1: Rūḷhiyā hi porāṇehi tyādīnaṁ purisasaññā vihitā.
anya-e0803n2:45_2: Atha vā bahuttepi sati samudāyavasena jātivasena vā cittena sampiṇḍetvā ekīkatassatthassa ekassa viya vacanampi ekavacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:45_3: bahutte nissitassa nissayavohārena vuttassa nissayavasena ekassa viya vacanampi ekavacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:45_4: ekattalakkhaṇena bavhatthānaṁ ekavacanaṁ viya vacanampi ekavacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:45_5: Abahuttepi sati attagarukārāparicchedamātikānusandhinayapucchāsabhāgaputhucitta- samāyogaputhuārammaṇavasena ekatthassa bahūnaṁ viya vacanaṁ bahuvacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:45_6: tathā ye ye bahavo tannivāsataṁputtasaṅkhātassekassatthassa rūḷhīvasena bahūnaṁ viya vacanampi bahuvacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:45_7: ekassatthassa aññenatthena ekābhidhānavasena bahūnaṁ viya vacanampi bahuvacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:45_8: ekassatthassa nissitavasena bahūnaṁ viya vacanampi bahuvacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:45_9: ekassatthassa ārammaṇabhedakiccabhedavasena bahūnaṁ viya vacanampi bahuvacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:45_11: ekamhi viya ca vattabbe ekavacanaṁ, bahumhi vattabbe,
anya-e0803n2:45_12: bahumhi viya ca vattabbe bahuvacanaṁ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Puthuvacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:48_0: Tasmā tadatthaviññāpanatthaṁ idha nāmikapayogehi sahevākhyātapayoge pavakkhāma – ‘‘rājā āgacchati, sahāyo me āgacchati,
anya-e0803n2:48_1: ekaṁ citta’’ miccevamādayo ekassatthassa ekavacanapayogā. ‘‘Rājāno āgacchanti, sahāyā me āgacchanti, na me dessā ubho puttā,
anya-e0803n2:49_0: ‘‘Sā senā mahatī āsi, bahujjano pasannosi, sabbo taṁ jano ojināyatu, itthigumbassa pavarā,
anya-e0803n2:49_3: pemaṁ mahantaṁ ratanattayassa, kare pasādañca naro avassaṁ, bhikkhusaṅgho, balakāyo, devanikāyo, ariyagaṇo’’- iccevamādayo,
anya-e0803n2:50_0: Katthaci pana īdisesu ṭhānesu bahuvacanapayogāpi dissanti.
anya-e0803n2:50_1: Tathā hi ‘‘pūjitā ñātisaṅghehi, devakāyā samāgatā, sabbete devanikāyā, dve devasaṅghā, tīṇi dukāni,
anya-e0803n2:50_3: Ime ekavacanavasena vattabbassa samudāyassa bahusamudāyavasena bahuvacanapayogāti gahetabbā,
anya-e0803n2:50_4: saṅgayhamānā ca bavhatthabahuvacane saṅgahaṁ gacchanti visuṁyeva vā,
anya-e0803n2:51_1: sasso sampajjati’’ iccevamādayo jātivasena bavhatthānaṁ ekavacanapayogā,
anya-e0803n2:52_1: sāvatthī saddhā ahosi pasannā’’ iccevamādayo nissayavasena pavattānaṁ nissayavohārena vuttānamekavacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:53_0: ‘‘Tilakkhaṇaṁ, kusalākusalaṁ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṁ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṁ, dhammavinayo, cittaseno ca gandhabbo,
anya-e0803n2:53_2: āgatigatiyā asati cutūpapāto na hoti’’ iccevamādayo ekattalakkhaṇe bavhatthānaṁ ekavacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:54_1: padhānanti kho meghiya vadamānaṁ kinti vadeyyāma’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa attavasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:55_0: ‘‘Te manussā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ ‘bhuñjatha bhante’ti, ahaṁ manussesu manussabhūtā,
anya-e0803n2:55_1: abbhāgatānā’sanakaṁ adāsiṁ’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa garukāravasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:56_1: asaṅkhatā dhammā’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa aparicchedavasena bahuvacanapayogā,
anya-e0803n2:57_0: Keci pana ‘‘desanāsotapātavasena bahuvacanapayogā’’tipi vadanti, taṁ na gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:57_1: Na hi tathāgato satisampajaññarahito dhammaṁ deseti,
anya-e0803n2:57_2: yutti ca na dissati ‘‘mātikāyaṁ pucchāyaṁ vissajjane cāti tīsupi ṭhānesu appaccayādidhamme desento satthā punappunaṁ bahuvacanavasena desanāsote patitvā dhammaṁ desetī’’ti.
anya-e0803n2:58_0: ‘‘Katame dhammā appaccayā’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa mātikānusandhinayena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:59_0: ‘‘Ime dhammā appaccayā’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa pucchānusandhinayena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:60_1: te dhamme ṭhapetvā avasesā kusalākusalābyākatā dhammā’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa pucchāsabhāgena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:61_0: ‘‘Atthi bhikkhave aññeva dhammā gambhīrā duddasā duranubodhā santā paṇītā atakkāvacarā nipuṇā paṇḍitavedanīyā,
anya-e0803n2:61_1: ye tathāgato sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetī’’ti ayamekassatthassa puthucittasamāyogaputhuārammaṇavasena bahuvacanapayogo.
anya-e0803n2:62_0: ‘‘Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ mahāvane,
anya-e0803n2:66_0: ‘‘Sāriputtamoggallāne āmantesi ‘gacchatha tumhe sāriputtā kīṭāgiriṁ gantvā assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ karotha,
anya-e0803n2:66_2: etha byagghā nivattavho’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa aññenatthena ekābhidhānavasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:67_0: ‘‘Mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṁ karonti’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa nissitavasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:69_0: ‘‘Cattāro sammappadhānā’’ti ayaṁ pana kiccabhedena ekassatthassa bahuvacanapayogo.
anya-e0803n2:70_2: Ettha pana jātyāpekkhekavacanaṁ atthato sāmaññāpekkhekavacanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:71_7: Iccevaṁ vīsadhā sabbāni ekavacanabahuvacanāni saṅgahitāni. Atridaṁ pāḷivavatthānaṁ –
anya-e0803n2:95_0: Idāni kālādivasena ākhyātappavattiṁ dīpayissāma – kālakārakapurisaparidīpakaṁ kriyālakkhaṇaṁ ākhyātikaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:98_1: Te hi upacāramukhyasabhāvavasena karonti karaṇanti ca ‘‘kārakā’’ti vuccanti.
anya-e0803n2:98_2: Teva yathākkamaṁ kriyānimitta taṁsādhaka taṁsabhāvāti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n2:99_0: Kammaṁ kattā ca bhāvo ca, iccevaṁ kārakā tidhā;
anya-e0803n2:107_0: Kārakattaṁ tu bhāvassa, sacepi na samīritaṁ;
anya-e0803n2:109_0: Kriyānipphatti natthīti, yuttitopi ca natthi taṁ;
anya-e0803n2:112_1: Tattha paṭhamapuriso ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇe sādhakavācake vā kammavācake vā tumhā’mhasaddavajjite paccattavacanabhūte nāmamhi ‘‘abhinīhāro samijjhati,
anya-e0803n2:112_2: bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesuñāṇa’’ntiādīsu viya payujjamānepi,
anya-e0803n2:112_3: taṭṭhāniyatte sati ‘‘bhāsati vā karoti vā, pīḷiyakkhoti maṁ vidū,
anya-e0803n2:112_4: vuccatīti vacana’’ntiādīsu viya appayujjamānepi sabbadhātūhi paro hoti.
anya-e0803n2:112_5: Katthaci pana pāḷippadese nāmassa appayuttattā paṭhamapurisapayogattho duranubodho bhavati,
anya-e0803n2:112_6: yathā ‘‘dukkhaṁ te vedayissāmi, tattha assāsayantu ma’’nti.
anya-e0803n2:112_8: tasmiṁ dukkhasāsanārocane vattuṁ avisahanavasena kilamantaṁ maṁ devassa ubho pādā assāsentu,
anya-e0803n2:112_9: vissaṭṭho kathehīti maṁ vadathāti adhippāyo ca bhavati.
anya-e0803n2:114_0: Tasmā upaṭṭhahaṁ gaṇhe, garuṁ garumataṁ vidū.
anya-e0803n2:115_0: Tatrimāni bhūdhātādhikārattā bhūdhātuvasena nidassanapadāni. So paribhavati, te paribhavanti, paribhavati, paribhavanti. Sapatto abhibhaviyate, sabbā vityā’nubhūyate, abhibhaviyate, anubhūyateti.
anya-e0803n2:115_1: Yattha satipi nāmassa sādhakavācakatte apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhati,
anya-e0803n2:115_2: tattha kammavācakaṁ paccattavacanabhūtaṁ tulyādhikaraṇapadaṁ paṭicca paṭhamapurisādayo tayo labbhanti. Taṁ yathā?
anya-e0803n2:115_6: Ettha panidaṁ vacanaṁ na vattabbaṁ ‘‘nindanti tuṇhimāsina’ntiādīsu satipi nāmassa kammavācakatte apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhatīti paṭhamapurisuppatti na siyā’’ti. Kasmāti ce?
anya-e0803n2:115_7: ‘‘Nindanti tuṇhimāsina’’ntiādīsu ‘‘janā’’ti ajjhāharitabbassa sādhakavācakassa nāmassa saddhimākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇabhāvassa icchitattā. Evamuttaratrāpi nayo.
anya-e0803n2:116_0: Majjhimapuriso ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇe sādhakavācake vā kammavācake vā paccattavacanabhūte tumhasadde payujjamānepi,
anya-e0803n2:116_1: taṭṭhāniyatte sati appayujjamānepi sabbadhātūhi paro hoti. Tvaṁ atibhavasi, tumhe atibhavatha, atibhavasi, atibhavatha.
anya-e0803n2:116_3: Yattha satipi tumhasaddassa sādhakavācakatte apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhati,
anya-e0803n2:116_5: Itare pana dve honti kammavācakaṁ paccattavacanabhūtaṁ tulyādhikaraṇapadaṁ paṭicca. Taṁ yathā? Tayā abhibhaviyate sapatto, tayā abhibhaviye ahaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:117_0: Uttamapuriso ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇe sādhakavācake vā kammavācake vā paccattavacanabhūte amhasadde payujjamānepi,
anya-e0803n2:117_1: taṭṭhāniyatte sati appayujjamānepi sabbadhātūhi paro hoti. Ahaṁ paribhavāmi, mayaṁ paribhavāma, paribhavāmi, paribhavāma.
anya-e0803n2:117_2: Ahaṁ paribhaviyyāmi akusalehi dhammehi, mayaṁ paribhaviyyāma, paribhaviyyāmi, paribhaviyyāma.
anya-e0803n2:117_3: Yattha satipi amhasaddassa sādhakavācakatte apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhati, na tattha uttamapuriso hoti.
anya-e0803n2:117_4: Itare pana dve honti kammavācakaṁ paccattavacanabhūtaṁ tulyādhikaraṇapadaṁ paṭicca. Taṁ yathā? Mayā anubhaviyate sampatti, mayā abhibhaviyase tvaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:117_5: Evaṁ yattha yattha sādhakavācakānaṁ vā kammavācakānaṁ vā nāmādīnaṁ paccattavacanabhūtānaṁ ākhyātapadehi tulyādhikaraṇatte laddhe tattha tattha paṭhamapurisādayo labbhanti,
anya-e0803n2:117_6: tasmā nāmādīnaṁ paccattavacanabhūtānaṁ tulyādhikaraṇabhāvoyeva paṭhamapurisādīnamuppattiyā kāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:118_0: Dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vā purisānamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n2:118_1: Ettha ekābhidhānaṁ nāma ekato abhidhānaṁ ekakālābhidhānañca. Tañca kho casaddapayogeyeva,
anya-e0803n2:118_5: Tattha tumhe atthakusalā bhavatha – iccetasmiṁ vohāre ‘‘so ca atthakusalo bhavati, tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi,
anya-e0803n2:118_6: tumhe atthakusalā bhavathā’’ti evaṁ dvinnamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n2:118_7: ‘‘Mayamatthakusalā bhavāma’’ iccetasmiṁ pana ‘‘so ca atthakusalo bhavati, ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi,
anya-e0803n2:118_8: mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā’’ti vā ‘‘tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi, ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi,
anya-e0803n2:118_9: mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā’’ti vā evampi dvinnamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo. ‘‘So ca atthakusalo bhavati, tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi, ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi,
anya-e0803n2:118_10: mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā’’ti vā ‘‘so ca atthakusalo bhavati, te ca atthakusalā bhavanti, tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi,
anya-e0803n2:118_11: tumhe ca atthakusalā bhavatha, ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi,
anya-e0803n2:118_12: mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā’’ti vā evaṁ tiṇṇamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n2:119_0: Aparopi atthanayo vuccati – ‘‘tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi, so ca atthakusalo bhavati,
anya-e0803n2:119_1: tumhe atthakusalā bhavathā’’ti vā ‘‘ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi, so ca atthakusalo bhavati,
anya-e0803n2:119_2: mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā’’ti vā iminā nayena anekappabhedo atthanayo.
anya-e0803n2:119_3: Evaṁ sesāsu vibhattīsu pañcamīsattamiyādīsu paropuriso gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n2:119_5: na pana bahuvacanantesupi ekassattano vācakesu garukātabbassekassatthassa vācakesu ca kriyāpadesu.
anya-e0803n2:125_0: Pacchā vutto paro nāma, saññāya paṭipāṭiyā;
anya-e0803n2:127_0: Paṭhamamhā paro nāma, majjhimo uttamopi ca;
anya-e0803n2:128_0: Majjhimamhā paro nāma, uttamo puriso ruto.
anya-e0803n2:131_0: ‘‘Tvañca bhadde sukhī hohi, eso cāpi mahāmigo’’;
anya-e0803n2:132_0: Iti pāṭho yato diṭṭho, tasmā evaṁ vademase.
anya-e0803n2:133_0: ‘‘Tumhe dve sukhitā hotha’’, iccattho tattha dissati;
anya-e0803n2:138_0: Tvañca jānapadā ceva, negamā ca samāgatā’’.
anya-e0803n2:141_0: Etā gāthāpi etassa, atthassa pana sādhikā;
anya-e0803n2:143_0: Evaṁ viññūhi viññeyyaṁ, bahunā bhāsitena kiṁ.
anya-e0803n2:145_0: Na virujjhati ce attho, taṁ pamāṇaṁ sudhīmataṁ.
anya-e0803n2:150_0: Saṅkhepatopettha purisappavatti evaṁ upalakkhitabbā ‘‘amhavacanatthe uttamo, tumhavacanatthe majjhimo,
anya-e0803n2:151_0: Tyādīnaṁ purisasaññā, yasmā vuttā tato idaṁ;
anya-e0803n2:154_0: Kriyālakkhaṇanti ettha kathaṁ ākhyātikassa kriyālakkhaṇatā veditabbā?
anya-e0803n2:155_0: Lakkhiyati kriyāyetaṁ, kriyā vā assa lakkhaṇaṁ;
anya-e0803n2:156_0: Kriyālakkhaṇatā evaṁ, veditabbā tathā hi ca.
anya-e0803n2:178_0: Evaṁ kālesu vibhattippavattiṁ ñatvā ye te suttantesu vicittā suvisadavipulatikhiṇabuddhivisayabhūtā payogā dissanti,
anya-e0803n2:178_1: tesu pāṭavamicchantehi tyādikkamena vuccamānā kriyāpadamālā sallakkhitabbā – bhavati, bhavanti. Bhavasi, bhavatha. Bhavāmi, bhavāma. Bhavate, bhavante. Bhavase, bhavavhe. Bhave, bhavāmhe.
anya-e0803n2:179_0: Dissanti ca suttantesu atthasambhavepi aññayogādirahitāni kriyāpadāni. Seyyathidaṁ? ‘‘Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti, yadā paññāya passati. Yaṁ maṁ bhaṇasi sārathi.
anya-e0803n2:179_1: Aññaṁ sepaṇṇi gacchāmi’’ iccevamādīni etassatthassa paridīpaniyā kriyāpadamālā.
anya-e0803n2:180_0: Ettha tividho kriyāpadesu yogo tayogo, mayogo, aññayogo ca.
anya-e0803n2:180_1: Tattha majjhimapurisā tayogavasena gahetabbā, uttamapurisā mayogavasena. Paṭhamapurisā aññayogavasena.
anya-e0803n2:183_0: Sotūnaṁ payogesu kosallatthaṁ aññayogādisahitamaparampi kriyāpadamālaṁ vadāma – so bhavati, te bhavanti. Tvaṁ bhavasi, tumhe bhavatha. Ahaṁ bhavāmi, mayaṁ bhavāma. So bhavate, te bhavante. Tvaṁ bhavase, tumhe bhavavhe. Ahaṁ bhave, mayaṁ bhavāmhe.
anya-e0803n2:184_0: Dissanti ca suttantesu aññayogādisahitānipi kriyāpadāni. Seyyathidaṁ?
anya-e0803n2:184_3: tassimāni satta ratanāni bhavanti. Yo dandhakāle tarati , taraṇīye ca dandhati, tvaṁsi ācariyo mama, ahampi daṭṭhukāmosmi,
anya-e0803n2:184_4: pitaraṁ me idhāgataṁ’’ iccevamādīni etassatthassa paridīpaniyā kriyāpadamālā.
anya-e0803n2:185_4: Yo ca amhasaddena vattabbe atthe nipatati, na pana hoti amhatthavācako,
anya-e0803n2:185_5: na sopi saddo kriyāpadassa mayogasahitattaṁ sādheti,
anya-e0803n2:186_0: Tatra tumhasaddena tāva vattabbatthe – ‘‘na bhavaṁ eti puññatthaṁ, sivirājassa dassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:186_2: Idha bhante bhagavā paṁsukūlaṁ dhovatū’’ti iccevamādayo payogā.
anya-e0803n2:186_3: Amhasaddena pana vattabbatthe ‘‘upāli taṁ mahāvīra, pāde vandati satthuno. Sāvako te mahāvīra,
anya-e0803n2:186_4: saraṇo vandati satthuno’’ti ca iccevamādayo payogā.
anya-e0803n2:186_5: Idametthupalakkhitabbaṁ ‘‘tvaṁ tumhe ahaṁ maya’’nti atthadīpaka tayoga mayogato añño aññatthadīpano payogoyeva aññayogo nāma,
anya-e0803n2:187_1: paggayha so tiṭṭhasi antalikkhe. Esa sutvā pasīdāmi,
anya-e0803n2:187_6: paggayha so tiṭṭhasi antalikkhe’’tiādīsu ‘‘so’’tiādikassa nāmasaddassa tumha’mhasaddassatthavācakasaddehi‘‘tiṭṭhasī’’tiādīnaṁ syādyantānaṁ padānaṁ dassanato accantamajjhāharitabbehi samānādhikaraṇattā tagguṇabhūtattā ca majjhimuttamapurisasambhavo samadhigantabbo.
anya-e0803n2:187_7: Īdisesu payogesu syādyantānaṁ dassanavasena avijjamānānipi ajjhāharitabbāni ‘‘tvamaha’’miccādīni padāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n2:187_8: Katthaci pana paripuṇṇāni dissanti ‘‘sātvaṁ vaṅkamanuppattā, kathaṁ maddi karissasi. So ahaṁ vicarissāmi,
anya-e0803n2:188_0: Ākhyātikassa kriyālakkhaṇattā aliṅgabhedattā ca tiṇṇaṁ liṅgānaṁ sādhāraṇabhāvaparidīpanatthaṁ aparampi kriyāpadamālaṁ vadāma –
anya-e0803n2:189_0: Puriso bhavati, kaññā bhavati, cittaṁ bhavati, purisā bhavanti, kaññāyo bhavanti, cittāni bhavanti. Bho purisa tvaṁ bhavasi, bhoti kaññe tvaṁ bhavasi, bho citta tvaṁ bhavasi,
anya-e0803n2:189_3: bhavanto cittāni tumhe bhavatha. Ahaṁ puriso bhavāmi, ahaṁ kaññā bhavāmi, ahaṁ cittaṁ bhavāmi, mayaṁ purisā bhavāma, mayaṁ kaññāyo bhavāma, mayaṁ cittāni bhavāma.
anya-e0803n2:191_2: Itthipumanapuṁsakānaṁ avisesattho vuccate ‘‘aliṅgabheda’’miti. Yathā ‘‘puriso gacchati, kaññā gacchati, cittaṁ gacchatī’’ti.
anya-e0803n2:191_3: Catudhā uddiṭṭhakriyāpadesu yathā ‘‘bhavatī’’ti akārānantaratyantapadaṁ gahetvā ‘‘bhavati bhavanti bhavasī’’tiādinā kriyāpadamālā sabbathā katā,
anya-e0803n2:191_4: evaṁ ‘‘ubbhavati’’ccādīnipi akārānantaratyantapadāni gahetvā ‘‘ubbhavati ubbhavanti ubbhavasī’’tiādinā kriyāpadamālā sabbathā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n2:191_6: ‘‘bhāveti vibhāvetī’’tiādīni ca ekārānantaratyantapadāni gahetvā pāḷinayānusāreneva padamālā kātabbā, nayidha vuttanayānusārena.
anya-e0803n2:191_9: Na hi loke lokiyā sabbe dhātusadde paccekaṁ sabbehipi channavutiyā vacanehi yojetvā vadanti,
anya-e0803n2:191_10: evaṁ avadantānampi nesaṁ kathā aparipuṇṇā nāma na hoti,
anya-e0803n2:191_11: tasmā vajjetabbaṭṭhānaṁ vajjetvā yathāsambhavaṁ padamālā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n2:192_0: Ito paṭṭhāya pana yathuddiṭṭhapadāneva pariṇāmetvā pariṇāmetvā pañcamiyādīnaṁ mātikābhāvena gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n2:192_1: Idāni pana tayogādisahitāsahitavasena dvidhā kriyāpadamālāyo dassessāma kvacādesavasena sambhūtāni ca rūpantarāni sotūnaṁ sukhadhāraṇatthañceva purisappayoge asammohatthañca.
anya-e0803n2:193_0: Bhavatu, bhavantu. Bhavāhi, bhava, bhavatha. Bhavāmi, bhavāma. Bhavataṁ, bhavantaṁ. Bhavassu, bhavavho. Bhave, bhavāmase. So bhavatu, te bhavantu. Tvaṁ bhavāhi, bhava, tumhe bhavatha. Ahaṁ bhavāmi, mayaṁ bhavāma. So bhavataṁ, te bhavantaṁ. Tvaṁ bhavassu, tumhe bhavavho. Ahaṁ bhave, mayaṁ bhavāmase.
anya-e0803n2:194_0: Bhaveyya, bhave, bhaveyyuṁ. Bhaveyyāsi, bhaveyyātha. Bhaveyyāmi, bhaveyyāma, bhavemu. Bhavetha, bhaveraṁ. Bhavetho, bhaveyyāvho. Bhaveyyaṁ, bhaveyyāmhe iti vā, so bhaveyya , bhave, te bhaveyyuṁ. Tvaṁ bhaveyyāsi, tumhe bhaveyyātha. Ahaṁ bhaveyyāmi, mayaṁ bhaveyyāma, bhavemu. So bhavetha, te bhaveraṁ. Tvaṁ bhavetho, tumhe bhaveyyāvho. Ahaṁ bhaveyyaṁ, mayaṁ bhaveyyāmhe iti vā.
anya-e0803n2:195_0: Babhūva, babhūvu. Babhūve, babhūvittha. Babhūvaṁ, babhūvimha. Babhūvittha, babhūvire. Babhūvittho, babhūvivho. Babhūviṁ, babhūvimhe iti vā, so babhūva, te babhūvu. Tvaṁ babhūve, tumhe babhūvittha. Ahaṁ babhūvaṁ, mayaṁ babhūvimha. So babhūvittha, te babhūvire. Tvaṁ babhūvittho, tumhe babhūvivho. Ahaṁ babhūviṁ, mayaṁ babhūvimhe iti vā.
anya-e0803n2:196_0: Abhavā, abhavū. Abhavo, abhavattha. Abhavaṁ, abhavamhā. Abhavattha, abhavatthuṁ. Abhavase, abhavavhaṁ. Abhaviṁ, abhavamhase iti vā, so abhavā, te abhavū. Tvaṁ abhavo, tumhe abhavattha. Ahaṁ abhavaṁ, mayaṁ abhavamhā. So abhavattha, te abhavatthuṁ. Tvaṁ abhavase, tumhe abhavavhaṁ. Ahaṁ abhaviṁ, mayaṁ abhavamhase iti vā.
anya-e0803n2:197_0: Abhavi, abhavuṁ. Abhavo, abhavittha. Abhaviṁ, abhavimhā. Abhavā, abhavū. Abhavase, abhavivhaṁ. Abhavhaṁ, abhavimhe iti vā, so abhavi, te abhavuṁ. Tvaṁ abhavo, tumhe abhavittha. Ahaṁ abhaviṁ, mayaṁ abhavimhā. So abhavā, te abhavū. Tvaṁ abhavase, tumhe abhavivhaṁ. Ahaṁ abhavaṁ, mayaṁ abhavimhe iti vā.
anya-e0803n2:198_0: Ettha panajjataniyā uṁvacanassa iṁsumādesavasena bhavatino rūpantarānipi veditabbāni. Seyyathidaṁ? Te bhaviṁsu, samubbhaviṁsu, pabhaviṁsu, parābhaviṁsu, sambhaviṁsu, pātubhaviṁsu, pātubbhaviṁsu , imāni akammakapadāni. Paribhaviṁsu, abhibhaviṁsu, adhibhaviṁsu, atibhaviṁsu, anubhaviṁsu, samanubhaviṁsu, abhisambhaviṁsu.
anya-e0803n2:201_1: na bhikkhu rūpe adhibhosī’’ti. Imāni sakammakapadāni,
anya-e0803n2:201_2: evamajjataniyā uṁvacanassa iṁsumādesavasena bhavatino rūpantarāni bhavanti. Apica
anya-e0803n2:204_0: Tatrāyaṁ pāḷi – so tena kammena divaṁ samakkami,
anya-e0803n2:204_2: Tattha anvabhīti anu abhīti chedo. Anūti upasaggo.
anya-e0803n2:205_0: Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Bhavissasi, bhavissatha. Bhavissāmi, bhavissāma. Bhavissate, bhavissante. Bhavissase, bhavissavhe. Bhavissaṁ, bhavissāmhe iti vā, so bhavissati, te bhavissanti. Tvaṁ bhavissasi, tumhe bhavissatha. Ahaṁ bhavissāmi, mayaṁ bhavissāma. So bhavissate, te bhavissante. Tvaṁ bhavissase, tumhe bhavissavhe. Ahaṁ bhavissaṁ, mayaṁ bhavissāmhe iti vā.
anya-e0803n2:206_0: Abhavissā, abhavissaṁsu. Abhavisse, abhavissatha. Abhavissaṁ, abhavissāmhā. Abhavissatha, abhavissisu. Abhavissase, abhavissavhe. Abhavissiṁ, abhavissāmhase iti vā, so abhavissā, te abhavissaṁsu. Tvaṁ abhavisse, tumhe abhavissatha. Ahaṁ abhavissaṁ, mayaṁ abhavissāmhā. So abhavissatha, te abhavissisu. Tvaṁ abhavissase, tumhe abhavissavhe. Ahaṁ abhavissiṁ, mayaṁ abhavissāmhase iti vā.
anya-e0803n2:211_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
